ygData.subject: Practicing Brass in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I ve read a lot of posts about where to practice DDD/brass skills, but I m afraid I deleted them all and now need the information.  You see, I had
ygData.messageBody:
I know I've read a lot of posts about where to practice DDD/brass
skills, but I'm afraid I deleted them all and now need the
information. You see, I had decided (having been there and verified
the safety) to do it in the Arena in Lake Rathe. Well, 18 came and I
am in Kunark. I am not going all the way to Lake Rathe just to
practice!

Someone said that they think brass skills are checked even when this
song is sung without an instrument. I am convinced that person
was right. The number of missed notes I'm having is just astounding
(frequently 20 or more in a row). I realize that missed notes are
not
uncommon for a new song, but this is ridiculous.

Oh, and if you have suggestions, please make them somewhere that a
"good" level 19 can get to. Thanks!

Lyressa (god I hope I put a point into brass before I came over here)
The Nameless
